Name: からかい上手の高木さんVR 2学期
About the game: The second VR of Takagi-san is here! In assuming the role of the main character, Nishikata, not only will you have the honor of being the target of Takagi-san's affection(!?!), you'll engage in a new VR animation experience by becoming a part of the comic series' world. Go heads up in poker with Takagi-san, go fishing together, and more! In addition to popular scenes from the original series, Teasing Master Takagi-san VR features original scenarios you can only experience here. If you ever wanted to trade places with Nishikata and get teased by Takagi-san, this is the animation for you! ''Shogakukan and Kayac Inc. tag-team to bring you the next generation of VR animation!'' Shogakukan teams up with VR content and entertainment creators at Kayac Inc. to deliver the VR anime debut of the popular romantic comedy Teasing Master Takagi-san. A mainstay in the monthly manga magazine Gessan, the series depicts the daily life of high school students Nishikata and Takagi-san, who loves to tease the former. Teasing Master Takagi-san VR invites you to experience the fun with original animation and stories. [Production Staff] Original Series Teasing Master Takagi-san (Karakai Jouzu no Takagi-san) Soichiro Yamamoto Published in Gessan (Monthly Shonen Sunday) [Cast] Rie Takahashi as Takagi-san [Planning and Development] Shogakukan & Kayac Inc.
